pr_title: Fixes issue where it would try to autocomplete/abandon messages that were already settled

timeline.message: Follow with .NET in not throwing error when RECEIVE_AND_DELETE mode is used and AutoComplete.
Add package private isSettled to message.
Adding logic to set isSettled in client receiver and utilise it in AutoComplete.
Check for disposed before waiting for semaphore.

timeline.bodyText: Do we need argument. ? Shouldn't this always set it to true
timeline.author: hemanttanwar

timeline.bodyText:
If the message is already settled, we should throw error with message something like The message has either been deleted or already settled 
Check line item 2 on this.
https://microsoft.sharepoint.com/teams/AzureDeveloperExperience/_layouts/15/Doc.aspx?sourcedoc={41b0af1e-8da3-4d88-b296-9b616c3e7b6b}&action=edit&wd=target%28Design.one%7C14d18aa9-3941-cf4d-b2fa-4b211ac30733%2FException%5C%2FError%20handling%7Ce696adb4-72c6-4a64-85fb-1d187557099b%2F%29&wdorigin=703
timeline.author: hemanttanwar

timeline.message: Set isSettled to true. Add error message.
